directions: Stir chicken broth, black beans, diced tomatoes with green chile peppers, petite diced tomatoes, chicken, garlic, red pepper flakes, salt, and black pepper together in a large pot; bring to a simmer and cook until hot and flavors combine, about 20 minutes.
ingredients: 2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, rinsed and drained
1 (14 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers (such as RO*TEL®)
2 (6 ounce) cans chunk white chicken, drained
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Easy Southwestern Chicken Soup
